name: part_004
file: tmp_【 #沙花叉クロヱ生誕LIVE 】沙花叉クロヱと不思議なキノコ 【ホロライブ⧸沙花叉クロヱ】 [rvIy1IOZNtA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe performs 'Kono Sora ga Trigger' (Ano Sora ga Trigger) on a colorful stage with candy and mushroom motifs.
A transition to the next performance featuring five members on a dark stage with a red moon backdrop.

subtitles.original: あの空がトリガー
subtitles.english: That sky was the trigger

subtitles.original: 恋人がいるって 最初から知ってた
subtitles.english: I knew from the start that you had a lover

subtitles.original: 話の合う ただの友達
subtitles.english: Just a friend I could talk to

subtitles.original: 君に勧められた 映画の半券って
subtitles.english: The ticket stub for the movie you recommended...

subtitles.original: なんとなく外せない
subtitles.english: I somehow can't bring myself to throw it away

subtitles.original: 向かいの方向き 君と目が合った
subtitles.english: Looking across at you, our eyes met

subtitles.original: 今日こそ 二人の赤い糸
subtitles.english: Surely today, the red thread between us...

subtitles.original: 切り離す 意地悪ね
subtitles.english: ...will be cut. How mean

subtitles.original: 青い空が綺麗だった日 あの日を忘れてない
subtitles.english: I haven't forgotten that day when the blue sky was so beautiful

subtitles.original: 目に映るものすべて
subtitles.english: Everything that reflects in my eyes...

subtitles.original: これは君を想いつづく歌 私だけの青春
subtitles.english: This is a song about thinking of you, my own private youth

subtitles.original: あの空がトリガーだったよ
subtitles.english: That sky was the trigger

subtitles.original: 君が好きだ
subtitles.english: I love you

subtitles.original: あのバンドがついに ツアーするって一応
subtitles.english: That band is finally going on tour, so just in case...

subtitles.original: 2枚で申し込む
subtitles.english: I applied for two tickets

subtitles.original: あの映画はどこで 行ったのかな 集中
subtitles.english: I wonder where that movie went. Focus

subtitles.original: できず 誰かの横顔とか
subtitles.english: I couldn't, looking at someone's side profile...

subtitles.original: 気にしたの きっとそう
subtitles.english: ...and worrying about it. Surely that's it

subtitles.original: 君は何も気づいていない あの日の空模様も
subtitles.english: You haven't noticed anything, not even the state of the sky that day

subtitles.original: 君には いつもの空
subtitles.english: To you, it's just the usual sky

subtitles.original: 愛おしくも見つけたら 誰に教えるのでしょう
subtitles.english: If you find something dear, who would you tell?

subtitles.original: シャッターの音が響いた
subtitles.english: The sound of the shutter echoed

subtitles.original: 行方はどこ
subtitles.english: Where is it headed?

subtitles.original: さあ 向かっていくか 坂道を
subtitles.english: Now, shall I head up the slope?

subtitles.original: 恋を 曖昧にごまかす
subtitles.english: My love, I vaguely cover it up

subtitles.original: この想い 伝えちゃダメとわかっている
subtitles.english: I know I shouldn't convey these feelings

subtitles.original: だけど だけど だけど だけど
subtitles.english: But... but... but... but...

subtitles.original: 心にずっと君がいる
subtitles.english: You are always in my heart

subtitles.original: 青い空が綺麗だった日 私だけが覚えて
subtitles.english: I'm the only one who remembers that day the blue sky was beautiful

subtitles.original: 君は誰かを想う
subtitles.english: You are thinking of someone else

subtitles.original: なのに勝手に好きでごめんね 私このままでいい
subtitles.english: And yet, I'm sorry for loving you on my own. I'm fine like this

subtitles.original: 空しか知らない この恋
subtitles.english: This love that only the sky knows

subtitles.original: 秘密にして
subtitles.english: Keep it a secret

subtitles.original: 君と二人で あの日会ったこと
subtitles.english: The fact that the two of us met that day...

subtitles.original: 言わないから 想っていたい
subtitles.english: ...I won't say it, because I want to keep loving you

subtitles.original: サラバ、愛しき悲しみたちよ
subtitles.english: Farewell, My Dear Sorrows
